H0.text: In which European capital city are the Hofburg Imperial Palace and St Stephen's Cathedral to be found. Budapest

H1.text: In which European capital city are the Hofburg Imperial Palace and St Stephen's Cathedral to be found. Prague

H2.text: In which European capital city are the Hofburg Imperial Palace and St Stephen's Cathedral to be found. Berlin

H3.text: In which European capital city are the Hofburg Imperial Palace and St Stephen's Cathedral to be found. Wien

A4.text: Located in the center of Vienna, it was built in the 13th century by Ottokar II of Bohemia and expanded several times afterwards.

A5.text: Since 1946, it has been the official residence and workplace of the president of Austria.
